meanings.definition: A small, dark spot on the skin caused by a clogged hair follicle.
meanings.sent1: I noticed a blackhead on my nose while looking in the mirror.
meanings.sent2: She used a special tool to extract the blackhead from her skin.
meanings.sent3: The blackhead on his cheek seemed to have its own personality.
meanings.sent4: The blackhead stood out on her face like a tiny ink blot.
meanings.sent5: The blackhead looked like a small dot of dirt on her otherwise clear skin.

meanings.definition: A type of comedo, a non-inflammatory acne lesion.
meanings.sent1: The dermatologist recommended a cream to treat the blackhead on her forehead.
meanings.sent2: Blackheads are common in people with oily skin.
meanings.sent3: The blackhead on his chin seemed to be playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her face was dotted with blackheads like tiny freckles.
meanings.sent5: She tried various remedies to get rid of the stubborn blackhead on her nose.
